sentences.english: The students and the instructor go out driving for blocks of two hours.

sentences.english: Of course, if troops had no food, a political director would speak empty words.

sentences.english: To complete the task after Du Xueyan returned to the women's resistance, even the instructor.

sentences.english: What apparently happened was that the Kwangsi Clique found the cost of British aircraft and instructors too high.
